entry.title: BIP proposal - Hashed Time-Locked Collateral Contract transactions
entry.summary: Matthew has written a proposed BIP for a new cross-chain debt protocol and shared it on Github. The BIP is specifically for the Atomic Loans protocol, as specified in a document available at arxiv.org. Matthew is seeking feedback on the proposal and wondering about the process for getting a BIP number assigned or any other necessary steps.
